name: Fvese - Meeting 2 - becoming 1000 chickens

shapecode_1_g=0.000
shapecode_1_b=0.000

shapecode_1_g2=1.000

shapecode_1_border_g=1.000
shapecode_1_border_b=1.000
shapecode_1_border_a=0.100

shapecode_2_sides=4
shapecode_2_additive=0
shapecode_2_thickOutline=0
shapecode_2_textured=0
shapecode_2_num_inst=1

shapecode_2_y=0.500
shapecode_2_rad=0.10000
shapecode_2_ang=0.00000
shapecode_2_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_2_tex_zoom=1.00000

shapecode_2_g=0.000
shapecode_2_b=0.000

shapecode_2_g2=1.000

shapecode_2_border_g=1.000
shapecode_2_border_b=1.000
shapecode_2_border_a=0.100

shapecode_3_sides=4
shapecode_3_additive=0
shapecode_3_thickOutline=0
shapecode_3_textured=0
shapecode_3_num_inst=1
shapecode_3_x=0.500
shapecode_3_y=0.500
shapecode_3_rad=0.10000
shapecode_3_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_3_r=1.000
shapecode_3_g=0.000
shapecode_3_b=0.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000
shapecode_3_r2=0.000
shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=wave_r = int(rand(100))/100;
per_frame_2=wave_g = int(rand(100))/100;
per_frame_3=wave_b = int(rand(100))/100;
per_frame_4=wave_y = wave_y + 0.2*sin(1.85*time);
per_frame_5=wave_x = wave_x + 0.5*sin(1.85*time);
per_frame_6=cx = cx - (cx+0.07*sin(rad*18 + time*9))+(zoom + 0.005*tan(ang-ang));
per_frame_7=cy = cy - (cy+0.07*sin(rad*18 + time*9))+(zoom + 0.005*tan(ang-ang));
per_frame_8=dx = 0.005 + 0.002*( 0.60*sin(0.234*time) + 0.40*sin(0.277*time) );
per_frame_9=dy = 0.005 + 0.002*( 0.60*sin(0.234*time) + 0.40*sin(0.277*time) );
per_frame_10=bass_eff = max(max(bass,bass_att)-1,0);
per_frame_11=bass_thresh = above(bass_att,bass_thresh)*2 + (1-above(bass_att,bass_thresh))*((bass_thresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_frame_12=decay = decay - 0.05*equal(frame%16,0);
per_frame_13=rot = 0.15*bass_eff;
per_pixel_1=zoom= zoom+0.003*tan(ang);
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    // sample previous frame
warp_4=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_5=`
warp_6=`    // feather pen
warp_7=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D( sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*(1-8*length(texsize.zw)) + 0.5 ).xyz);
warp_8=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D( sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*(1+8*length(texsize.zw)) + 0.5 ).xyz);
warp_9=`
warp_10=`    // darken over time
warp_11=`    ret -= 0.034;
warp_12=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    float2 uv2 = uv;
comp_4=`    uv2.x=1-uv2.x; 
comp_5=`
comp_6=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz;
comp_7=`    float3 ret2 = tex2D(sampler_main, uv2).xyz;
comp_8=`
comp_9=`    ret *= frac(ret*4)*2;
comp_10=`    ret2*= frac(ret2*4)*2;
comp_11=`    ret += GetBlur1(uv) * .1;
comp_12=`    ret2+= GetBlur1(uv2) * .1;
comp_13=`    ret *= ret; 
comp_14=`    ret2*= ret2; 
comp_15=`
comp_16=`ret+=ret2;
comp_17=`}
